work.name: Medtronic Diabetes
work.summary: Software engineer contributing to comprehensive modernization of Medtronic Carelink healthcare platform
highlights: Troubleshoot and resolve system issues in Carelink platform across multiple environments (Dev, Test, Stage, Prod), ensuring reliable service delivery through Agile SDLC practices
Support diverse API integrations serving patients, healthcare professionals, customer service agents, and device teams interfacing with Medtronic Diabetes' core systems
Implement data validation improvements and bug fixes for user consent management, configuration updates, and service utilities within the Carelink ecosystem
Collaborate on Auth0 platform integration to enhance global authentication capabilities

work.name: Amazon Web Services
work.summary: Enhanced AWS Lambda's Concurrency Limit Management Service (CLMS) to optimize ARM-based workload management and customer concurrency limits
highlights: Authored and received approval for technical design documentation detailing CLMS workflow improvements and architectural changes to support ARM workload integration
Implemented approved design using Java and Dagger2 DI framework, incorporating sophisticated SQL queries for Lambda metrics analysis
Established robust quality assurance through comprehensive unit testing with JUnit and Mockito frameworks, ensuring reliable deployment through CI/CD pipeline

work.summary: Researched and implemented search optimization strategies for content discovery
highlights: Evaluated and implemented search solutions using Sphinx and Elasticsearch/Kibana to improve article discovery
Developed strategies for enhancing content recommendation system

work.name: Wolfram Research
work.summary: Specialized in Korean language integration for Wolfram Alpha's computational knowledge engine
highlights: Developed and tested Korean Natural Language Processing systems for accurate query parsing and computation
Created and maintained Korean language test suite to ensure computational reliability
